long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring your browsing to life with unique scrolling controls that add randomness and customization to every page you visit. Whether you want to scroll up, down, or return to a previous position, Stair Scroller makes it easy with simple click functions and plenty of ways to make it your own.

Features:
	•	Click-Based Scrolling: Control your page navigation with unique click Actions:
	•	Single-click for a randomized scroll up or down.
	•	Double-click to instantly return to your last position.
	•	Triple-click to jump straight to the top or bottom of the page.
	•	Customizable Buttons: Make the scrolling buttons fit your style:
	•	Color Choices: Pick custom colors for the buttons and icons to match your preferences.
	•	Position Options: Choose to display the buttons on the left or right side of the screen for easy access.
	•	Visibility Toggle: Hide or show the buttons at any time to keep your screen uncluttered.
	•	Dark Mode Support: Switch between light and dark themes effortlessly to suit your environment or simply for style.
	•	Accessibility-Friendly Design: Stair Scroller is built with accessibility in mind, ensuring a smooth and user-friendly experience for everyone, including keyboard and screen reader support where possible.

Whether you’re looking for a unique way to scroll, adding a splash of color, or just having fun with random scrolling, Stair Scroller makes navigating pages more engaging and fully customizable to your taste!
